dct_description_sm: Map surrounded by people depicting the Americas, Europe, Africa and Asia. A small mounted globe sits at the bottom middle between the two hemispheres. Text on pedestal near globe reads:, â€œCum Deo et Die.
In: Kinder Geographie ... / bei George Peter Monath. -- Nurnberg : [s.n.], 1746.

In: Kurzverfassete Kinder Geographie, in acht und vierzig sectionen eingetheilet, und mit benoethigsen Sharfen versehen ... / bei George Peter Monath. -- Nurnberg : [s.n.], 1758. 1 atlas ([ii],55p, 8 hand col. maps); 32.6 cm.
California as a large island and named off the coastline California. Island has one large open bay directly on its top and a smaller bay to its right.
